item.title: Faster than you think: 4 reasons why electric vehicles will dominate sooner than estimates
item.description: Reposted from electrade.app If any of your friends still think EVs are far away, here are four arguments to convince them otherwise. We believe that everyone is making a common mistake on EVs: underestimating exponential growth. This makes technology adoption curves are hard to predict - the classic example being asking someone in 2007 how fast it would take for the majority of the world to have access to a smartphone.
